privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.dataTypesText: We process the following categories of data:
privacy.domainData: Domain Data: Website URLs entered by you for analysis
privacy.analysisResults: Analysis Results: Technical data about scanned websites (SSL status, performance metrics, meta tags)
privacy.usageData: Usage Data: Number of scans performed, features used
privacy.technicalData: Technical Data: IP address, browser information, access times
privacy.purposeText: Data processing is carried out for the following purposes:
privacy.legalBasisText: Processing is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR (contract performance) and Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interests for providing and improving our services).
privacy.dataSharingText: We use external APIs for website analysis:
privacy.googlePageSpeed: Google PageSpeed API: For performance analysis
privacy.dnsServices: DNS Services: For technical domain verification
privacy.dataSharingNote: These services only receive the necessary data (domain URLs) to perform the analysis.
privacy.rightAccess: Access to your stored data (Art. 15 GDPR)
